title: All sorts, just a clear out up date......

posts.content: Hi,Ron how much for everything as a job lot ? call 07914201724 cheers

Hi Ron
Reference your advert for retirement sale.
Do you happen to have a genuine rear light holder for a 67 splitscreen
I have inadvertently damaged mine and would like original.
If so, how much inc delivery?
Kind regards
Paul

[quote="Rocket Ron"]With retirement comes a clear out of the workshop and all that entails.......lots of stuff
There is too much to list, lots of tin ware, all genuine.
Without going into to much detail, if you guys out there need a part then feel free to drop me a mail.
All the parts will be cheep as to dump this lot would be a sin..
Just do me a list and I can only say no.
No big panels, some new chassis bits, glass, busted quarter lights, LHD steering box.
I have bay and splitty stuff.
Fire away..

Hi Ron
Reference your advert for retirement sale.
Do you happen to have a genuine rear light holder for a 67 splitscreen
I have inadvertently damaged mine and would like original.
If so, how much inc delivery?
Kind regards
Paul
